abstract: Use of the anemia drugs will be reviewed by federal health insurance programs because of concerns that side effects may be harming patients.
snippet: Use of the anemia drugs will be reviewed by federal health insurance programs because of concerns that side effects may be harming patients.
lead_paragraph: Use of the anemia drugs Aranesp and Epogen, made by Amgen, and Procrit, from Johnson & Johnson, will be reviewed by federal health insurance programs because of concerns that side effects may be harming patients.

headline.main: U.S. to Review Anemia Drugs for Safety
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Review Anemia Drugs For Safety
